alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued November 24 at 8:56AM PST until November 25 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST SATURDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 36 will result in frost formation. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 possible. * WHERE...North Bay Interior Valleys. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Saturday. For the Freeze Watch, from Saturday evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...These temperatures will be hazardous to vulnerable populations.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
